_description: Odoo module configuration requirements - dynamically loaded by the adaptive interview agent
_note: Add new modules or update questions here without changing code

sale_management.name: Sales
sale_management.description: Quotations, sales orders, and invoicing workflow

questions: What types of products do you sell? (Physical goods that ship, services delivered, digital products, subscriptions?)
For each product type, when should the customer be invoiced? (When order is confirmed, when product ships, or based on time/milestones?)
setup_areas.context: Determines product type and invoicing policy - critical for order-to-cash flow

questions: Do different customers pay different prices? (Retail vs wholesale, VIP customers, regional pricing?)
How do discounts work? (Percentage off, fixed amount, quantity-based tiers, promotional codes?)
Do prices change based on order quantity?
setup_areas.context: Configures pricelists, discounts, and pricing tiers

questions: Do sales quotes need manager approval before sending to customers? If so, at what discount or order value?
How long should quotes be valid by default?
Do customers need to sign quotes electronically before they become orders?
setup_areas.context: Configures quotation templates, validity, e-signature, and approval workflows

questions: How is sales organized? By region, by product type, by customer segment, or individual salespeople?
Do salespeople have targets or quotas? Monthly, quarterly, annually?
How should new leads/customers be assigned to salespeople?
setup_areas.context: Configures sales team structure, targets, and assignment rules

crm.name: CRM - Customer Relationship Management
crm.description: Lead and opportunity tracking, sales pipeline management

questions: What stages does a potential deal go through? (e.g., New Lead → Qualified → Proposal Sent → Negotiation → Won/Lost)
At which stages do deals commonly get stuck? What should happen then?
Do certain stages require completing specific tasks before moving forward? (e.g., must have budget confirmed before sending proposal)
setup_areas.context: Configures CRM pipeline stages, flow, and stage requirements

questions: Where do your leads come from? (Website forms, phone calls, referrals, trade shows, advertising?)
Do you need to track which marketing campaigns or ads generate leads?
Should leads from different sources go to different salespeople?
setup_areas.context: Configures lead source tracking and marketing attribution

questions: How do you determine if a lead is worth pursuing? What makes a lead 'hot' vs 'cold'?
What information must be captured before a lead can move to opportunity stage?
Should the system automatically score or prioritize leads based on criteria?
setup_areas.context: Configures lead qualification criteria and scoring

questions: What follow-up activities do salespeople typically do? (Calls, emails, meetings, demos?)
Should the system prompt salespeople when activities are overdue?
Do you want to track activity metrics (calls made, emails sent, etc.)?
setup_areas.context: Configures activity types and reminders

questions: How many warehouses or storage locations do you have?
Within each warehouse, do you need to track specific zones, racks, shelves, or bins?
Do different warehouses serve different purposes? (e.g., main warehouse vs returns warehouse vs quality hold)
setup_areas.context: Configures warehouse hierarchy and storage locations

questions: Do any products need unique serial numbers tracked? (e.g., electronics with serial numbers)
Do any products need batch/lot tracking? (e.g., food with production batches)
Do you have products with expiration dates that need tracking?
Do you need to trace where products came from (for recalls)?
setup_areas.context: Configures product traceability - serial, lot, and expiry tracking

questions: For stocked products: at what inventory level should you reorder? Who decides?
Do you make products to order (only when customer orders) or keep them in stock?
Do any products get shipped directly from your supplier to the customer (dropship)?
Should the system automatically create purchase orders when stock is low?
setup_areas.context: Configures inventory routes (MTS/MTO/dropship) and reordering rules

questions: How does picking work? One order at a time, or batch multiple orders together?
Is packing done at a separate station or combined with picking?
Do you use barcode scanners in the warehouse?
Do you need to weigh packages before shipping?
setup_areas.context: Configures warehouse operations - picking, packing, shipping

questions: Which shipping carriers do you use? (UPS, FedEx, DHL, local carriers?)
Do you need to print shipping labels automatically?
How are shipping costs calculated? (Flat rate, by weight, carrier rates?)
Do customers choose shipping speed at checkout?
setup_areas.context: Configures shipping carriers and delivery methods

account.name: Accounting
account.description: General ledger, invoicing, payments, financial reporting

questions: In which country do you file your primary tax returns?
Do you need accounting compliance for multiple countries?
What accounting standards do you follow? (Local GAAP, IFRS, US GAAP?)
Do invoices need specific legal formats or fields for your country?
setup_areas.context: Selects localization package - determines chart of accounts, tax rules, and legal compliance

questions: Do you have an existing chart of accounts you want to replicate, or start fresh?
How detailed should revenue tracking be? (One account vs by product category vs by product?)
Do you need to track profit/loss separately by business unit, department, or project?
Do you use cost centers for expense allocation?
setup_areas.context: Configures chart of accounts and analytic accounting dimensions

questions: What sales tax/VAT rates do you charge? (List all rates you use)
Do tax rates vary by product type? (e.g., food at lower rate, services at standard rate)
Do tax rates vary by customer location? (Cross-border sales, different states?)
Do you have tax-exempt customers or products?
setup_areas.context: Configures tax rates and fiscal positions for different scenarios

questions: What are your standard payment terms for customers? (Due on receipt, Net 15, Net 30, etc.)
Do you offer early payment discounts? (e.g., 2% if paid within 10 days)
Do different customer types have different payment terms?
What payment terms do your vendors give you?
setup_areas.context: Configures payment terms for customers and vendors

questions: Which banks do you use for business accounts?
How do you currently import bank statements? (Download files, bank API, manual entry?)
Do you want automatic matching of payments to invoices?
Do you handle petty cash or need cash journal tracking?
setup_areas.context: Configures bank accounts, journals, and reconciliation settings

questions: Should invoices be sent automatically when orders are confirmed or shipped?
Do you need to customize invoice templates with your branding?
Do you send invoices by email, print and mail, or both?
Do you need recurring/subscription invoicing?
setup_areas.context: Configures invoice automation and delivery

questions: How many vendors do you regularly purchase from?
Do you have negotiated pricing agreements or contracts with key vendors?
Do you need to track multiple vendors per product with different prices/lead times?
Do you evaluate vendor performance (delivery timeliness, quality)?
setup_areas.context: Configures vendor relationships and pricing

questions: Who can create purchase orders? Does anyone need to approve them?
At what dollar amount do purchases need approval? By whom?
Do you have purchase agreements or blanket orders with vendors?
Should the system automatically create POs when inventory is low?
setup_areas.context: Configures purchase approval workflows and automation

questions: Do you inspect received goods before accepting them?
How do you handle partial deliveries from vendors?
Do you receive items at a specific location before putting them away?
Do you track landed costs (shipping, customs) as part of product cost?
setup_areas.context: Configures receiving process and cost tracking

mrp.name: Manufacturing (MRP)
mrp.description: Bills of materials, manufacturing orders, work centers

questions: Describe a typical product's bill of materials - how many components/levels deep?
Do you have products with variants (sizes, colors) that share similar BOMs?
Do you need to track co-products or by-products from manufacturing?
Can the same product be made different ways (alternate BOMs)?
setup_areas.context: Configures bill of materials structure and variants

questions: What machines, workstations, or work areas are used in production?
Do you need to track capacity and availability per work center?
Do different products require different sequences of work centers?
Do you track machine efficiency or utilization?
setup_areas.context: Configures work centers and capacity planning

questions: How are manufacturing orders created? Manually, from sales orders, or automatically when stock is low?
Do manufacturing steps have specific operations that workers follow?
Do workers need detailed work instructions at their stations?
Do you track actual time vs planned time for operations?
setup_areas.context: Configures manufacturing order workflow and routing

questions: Do you do quality inspections during or after manufacturing?
What quality checks are performed? (Measurements, visual, testing?)
What happens when a product fails quality inspection?
Do you need to track quality metrics over time?
setup_areas.context: Configures quality control checkpoints

questions: What departments exist in your company?
What job positions/titles do you have?
Do you need to track reporting relationships (org chart)?
Do you have multiple office locations with employees?
setup_areas.context: Configures organizational structure

questions: What employee information do you need to track? (Personal info, emergency contacts, skills?)
Do employees have company equipment assigned to them?
Do you need to store employee documents? (Contracts, certifications?)
setup_areas.context: Configures employee record fields

questions: How do employees record their working hours? (Clock in/out, honor system, timesheets?)
Do you have fixed schedules or flexible working hours?
Do you need to track overtime? What are the overtime rules?
Do employees work different shifts?
setup_areas.context: Configures attendance tracking and work schedules

questions: What types of leave do employees get? (Vacation, sick, personal, parental?)
How are leave balances calculated? (Annual allocation, accrual?)
What is the approval process for leave requests?
Can employees carry over unused leave to next year?
setup_areas.context: Configures leave types and policies

questions: What types of projects do you manage? (Client projects, internal, R&D?)
How do you organize work within projects? (Phases, milestones, tasks, subtasks?)
Do projects have budgets or spending limits?
Do you need project templates for common project types?
setup_areas.context: Configures project structure and stages

questions: Do you bill clients for project work?
How do you charge? (Fixed price, hourly/time & materials, milestone-based?)
Should timesheets automatically create billable invoice lines?
Do you need to track project profitability?
setup_areas.context: Configures project billing and profitability tracking

questions: How should employees log time on projects? (Daily, per task, per project?)
Do timesheets need manager approval before billing?
Should there be minimum hours logged per day or maximum per project?
Do you track time spent vs time estimated?
setup_areas.context: Configures timesheet entry and approval

questions: What domain will your online store use?
Do you need multiple storefronts or languages?
Should customers create accounts or checkout as guests?
Do you need a customer portal where they can track orders?
setup_areas.context: Configures website and customer access

questions: How should products be organized? (Categories, collections, brands?)
Do you need product variants on the website? (Sizes, colors, options?)
Do you show products with zero stock? With 'notify when available'?
Do you need product comparisons or wishlists?
setup_areas.context: Configures product catalog display

questions: What payment methods do you accept online? (Credit card, PayPal, bank transfer?)
Do you offer shipping options at checkout or flat rate?
Do you have promotional codes or coupons?
Do you need gift cards?
setup_areas.context: Configures checkout and payment
